verses.roman:
nityānanda kahe-aiche haya kon jana
ye tomāre kahe, 'kara rāja-daraśana'

synonyms: nityānanda kahe—Nityānanda Prabhu said; aiche—such; haya—there is; kon jana—any person; ye—who; tomāre—unto You; kahe—orders; kara—do; rāja-daraśana—meeting the King.
translation: Nityānanda Prabhu then said, "Who is there in the three worlds who can ask You to see the King?
